name: serverest
description: Projeto que contém a automação dos cenários de testes da aplicação serverest.dev

scripts.cypress:run: cypress run --reporter mochawesome; npx mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/mochawesome-report/*.json > cypress/reports/mochawesome.json && rm -rf ./cypress/reports/mochawesome-report/ && npx marge cypress/reports/mochawesome.json -o cypress/reports
scripts.report:cleanup: rm -rf ./cypress/reports/mochawesome-report/ && rm -rf ./cypress/reports/assets/ && rm -rf cypress/reports/mochawesome.html &&  rm -fr cypress/screenshots && rm -f ./cypress/reports/mochawesome.json && rm -fr mochawesome-report

author: Andriano Toazza
